results.content: Direct and to the point. I like the fast pace.
results.content_html: Direct and to the point. I like the fast pace.

results.content: This is Vue3 - TypeScript course. And there is almost nothing from TypeScript in it. The teacher speaks too slowly and explanations are very poor. The absolute beginners will hardly follow this course because almost no words about back end and the data structure from it. It also shows only the most basic things only from Vue3. So I can't define the purpose of this course and for whom it 's intended.
results.content_html: This is Vue3 - TypeScript course. And there is almost nothing from TypeScript in it. The teacher speaks too slowly and explanations are very poor. results.content: The content is exactly what I want to see but I have to spend a lot of time going back and figuring out what antonio has clicked to arrive at a certain place. Particularly when copying bootstrap resources. Its hard to work out where to get the bootstrap sources from as the versions have changed on bootstrap and bootstrapcdn.com no longer works. I have to squint and see the urls from the video. This could be fixed if there was reources files provided. Antonio clearly knows what he is doing but there is little explanation of why we are doing things.

response.content:
Hey Dave,
Thank you for the nice review. Some of your requests are already fixed the video resolution is better now and I added the source code too. Also I'm planning to upgrade the course with more features and hopefully you will upgrade your review by then :)

results.content:
What is the typeScript inside the components ?

response.content:
Hi Marcio,
You are clearly mistaken check the Vue 3 documentation please and that is the way Vue 3 uses typescript. Also how about the store and router files, were they all typescript files? If you didn't like the course is fine but please don't give the wrong message to the other students that I don't use Typescript.
Best,
Antonio
